title: Kazekage Rescue Mission
summary: Naruto returns to Konoha after two-and-a-half years of training, just in time to help rescue the Fifth Kazekage from Akatsuki.

title: Tenchi Bridge Reconnaissance Mission
summary: Naruto and a new version of Team 7 use information gained from Akatsuki to try to find Sasuke.

title: Twelve Guardian Ninja
summary: Naruto meets Sora, both of whom become entangled in a plot to destroy Konoha.

title: Akatsuki Suppression Mission
summary: To counter the growing threat of Akatsuki, Konoha tracks down two of its members who are prowling the Land of Fire.

title: Three-Tails' Appearance
summary: Konoha attempts to stop the Three-Tails from being acquired by Orochimaru or Akatsuki.

title: Itachi Pursuit Mission
summary: Sasuke and Naruto each assemble teams to make separate attempts to locate Sasuke's brother, Itachi Uchiha.

title: Tale of Jiraiya the Gallant
summary: Jiraiya infiltrates Amegakure in order to learn more about the leader of Akatsuki, Pain.

title: Fated Battle Between Brothers
summary: Sasuke initiates a fight to the death with his brother, Itachi, hoping that doing so will avenge the deaths of their clan.

title: Six-Tails Unleashed
summary: On their way home from their failed mission to find Itachi, Naruto and his team are diverted in order to fulfil Konoha's obligations to the Tsuchigumo clan.

title: Pain's Assault
summary: Pain attacks Konoha in order to capture Naruto.

title: Past Arc: The Locus of Konoha
summary: As Konoha starts to rebuild, its villagers reminisce about their memories of the past.

title: Five Kage Summit
summary: With Akatsuki in possession of nearly all nine tailed beasts, the Kage of the ninja villages gather to decide how to respond.

title: Fourth Shinobi World War: Countdown
summary: With the Fourth Shinobi World War declared, the Allied ninja and Akatsuki make opposing preparations for the approaching conflict.

title: Fourth Shinobi World War: Confrontation
summary: The Allied ninja struggle against Akatsuki's White Zetsu Army and the historic figures revived by the Impure World Reincarnation.

title: Fourth Shinobi World War: Climax
summary: After defeating the Impure World Reincarnation, the Allied ninja are left to deal with the combined forces of Madara and Obito Uchiha.

title: Kakashi's Anbu Arc: The Shinobi That Lives in the Darkness
summary: Kakashi Hatake's past is explored, connecting theend of Kakashi Gaiden to the start of Prologue — Land of Waves.

title: Fourth Shinobi World War: Climax
summary: After defeating the Impure World Reincarnation, the Allied ninja are left to deal with the combined forces of Madara and Obito Uchiha.

title: Birth of the Ten-Tails' Jinchūriki
summary: Using the nine tailed beasts captured by Akatsuki, Obito and Madara try to use the power of the resulting Ten-Tails to perform the Infinite Tsukuyomi.

title: Jiraiya Shinobi Handbook: The Tale of Naruto the Hero
summary: Trapped by the Infinite Tsukuyomi, Tsunade dreams about a book that Jiraiya could have written.

title: Itachi Shinden Book: Light and Darkness
summary: While the world falls victim to the Infinite Tsukuyomi, Sasuke reflects on the life of his brother, Itachi.

title: Kaguya Ōtsutsuki Strikes
summary: The Infinite Tsukuyomi introduces a new threat, Kaguya Ōtsutsuki, as well as an opportunity for Naruto and Sasuke to finally resolve their years of conflict.

title: Childhood
summary: Before they were heroes of the Fourth Shinobi World War, they were only children...

title: End
summary: Wedding and shit!
